assertions.assertion:
The function will compare not more than n bytes from the array pointed to by s1 to the array pointed to by s2. Upon succesful completion, function will return an integer greater than 0, if possibly null-terminated array pointed to by s1 is greater than the possibly null-terminated array pointed to by s2.
The function will compare not more than n bytes from the array pointed to by s1 to the array pointed to by s2. Upon succesful completion, function will return an integer equal to 0, if possibly null-terminated array pointed to by s1 is equal to the possibly null-terminated array pointed to by s2.
The function will compare not more than n bytes from the array pointed to by s1 to the array pointed to by s2. Upon succesful completion, function will return an integer less than 0, if possibly null-terminated array pointed to by s1 is less than the possibly null-terminated array pointed to by s2.
